svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: How important is God in your life? vs GDP per capita, 2014
Shown on the y-axis is the average answer to the question "How important is God in your life?". Answers could be
given on a scale from 0 (not at all important) to 10 (very important).
How important is God in your life?
Source: World Bank, World Values Survey / European Values Survey via the Quality of Government dataset
